title: Pakistan: Finance Ministry forecasts gloomy economy amid rising inflation - ANI News
content: Pakistan: Finance Ministry forecasts gloomy economy amid rising inflation  ANI News
description: Islamabad [Pakistan], April 30 (ANI): Owing to a combination of internal and external challenges of unpredictable tenure in Pakistan, the Ministry of Finance on Friday forecasted tough days ahead -- including rising inflation, expanding current account deficit, higher fiscal deficit and dampening economic growth prospects, said media reports.
